bike.description: Able to ride across the city on a daily commute or carry you and your haul across the state. Heritage conventional diamond frame, handcrafted in Chicago with American High-Tensile steel. •Velo-Orange leather saddle •Soma Lauterwasser Alloy handlebars •Tektro Brakes •Natural Cork grips •Velo-Orange Chainguard •Velo-Orange Smooth Fenders •Weinmann Alloy Wheelset •Single-Speed freewheel •Schwalbe Delta Cruiser tires with K-Guard® Customize Your Chief!
